infor.name: deferred-pensions
infor.message:
Deferred pensions

If you have one or more deferred Money Purchase/Defined Contribution pensions or AVCs, add together the current fund values and enter the total amount.

infor.name: current-pensions
infor.message:
Current fund value of existing pensions

You will be able to find this on your last annual statement. For a more up-to-date quotation, you can contact your pension provider.

Alternatively, you could enter an estimated value.

infor.name: you-paying
infor.message:
Employee contribution

Enter the regular monthly amount you pay into your pension.

If you do not contribute, leave this blank.

infor.name: your-employer
infor.message:
Employer contribution

Enter the regular monthly amount your employer pays into your pension.

Skip the question if this is not relevant.

infor.name: Defined-Benefits
infor.message:
Defined Benefits (Final Salary)

Enter the annual income amount that you are likely to receive from this pension in today's terms (not the projected amount which is sometimes referred to as 'revalued' pension).

If you have more than one DB scheme, add them together and enter the total amount.

infor.name: income-payable
infor.message:
Defined Benefits (Final Salary)

Enter the annual income amount that you are likely to receive from this pension in today's terms (not the projected amount which is sometimes referred to as 'revalued' pension).

If you have more than one DB scheme, add them together and enter the total amount.
